definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: The paper describes the working principle of magnetic electric sensor in safety airbag of automobile.
sentences.chinese: 该文论述了汽车安全气囊磁电式传感器的工作原理。

sentences.english: All have head-protecting curtain side airbags that cover both seating rows.
sentences.chinese: 所有有保护头部的侧帘安全气囊，涵盖两排座椅。

sentences.english: The front-row both well entire aerocyst belongs to the standard layout similarly.
sentences.chinese: 前排双安全气囊同样属于标准配置。

sentences.english: those with airbags often failed to buckle their seat-belts.
sentences.chinese: 未配备安全气囊的司机通常不系安全带。

sentences.english: Remove the screws that secure the instrument panel wire harness trough to the airbag rear mounting bracket.
sentences.chinese: 拆去固定仪表板线束槽到安全气囊后固定托架的螺丝。

sentences.english: The airbags still don't deploy unless there's an actual crash.
sentences.chinese: 另外除非碰撞的确发生了，否则安全气囊不会展开。

sentences.english: Disposal begins with the neutralisation of airbags and other pyrotechnical components.
sentences.chinese: 回收的第一步是拆除安全气囊和其它烟火部件。

sentences.english: Airbag available only on full-featured version.
sentences.chinese: 安全气囊只能在全功能的版本。

sentences.english: With the DRB read the status of the airbag warning lamp and note the state of it.
sentences.chinese: 用DRB读安全气囊警示灯的状态并注意它的状态。

sentences.english: You should also consult your insurance company before deactivating an airbag.
sentences.chinese: 你也应该停用安全气囊前咨询您的保险公司。

sentences.english: They accomplished this by installing more head-protecting side airbags.
sentences.chinese: 他们完成了安装更多的头部保护侧安全气囊。

sentences.english: Dual stage air bag system has been adopted to both driver and front passenger sides.
sentences.chinese: 两级安全气囊系统已经应用到驾驶员和前排乘客侧。

definition: to brake (when driving)/to stop/to switch off/to check (bad habits)/a brake
enclosed carriage for carrying passengers/motor carriage/car or bus/limousine/CL:部[bu4],輛|辆[liang4]
to tailgate/to hit the car in front as a result of tailgating
